Uses of Interface
org.turbogwt.core.future.shared.ProgressCallback

  • Packages that use ProgressCallback 
    Package Description
    org.turbogwt.core.future.shared  
    org.turbogwt.core.future.shared.impl  

    • Uses of ProgressCallback in org.turbogwt.core.future.shared

      Methods in org.turbogwt.core.future.shared with parameters of type ProgressCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Promise<D,F,P,C> Promise.progress(ProgressCallback<P> callback)
      This method will register ProgressCallback so that when a Deferred object is notified of progress (Deferred.notify(Object)), ProgressCallback will be triggered.

    • Uses of ProgressCallback in org.turbogwt.core.future.shared.impl
